hero.headline: Your Complete Home Selling Guide
hero.subline: How to sell your Westchester County home for maximum value — with minimum stress.

steps.title: Initial Consultation
steps.description: Walkthrough of your home, discussion of your goals and timeline.

steps.title: Pricing Strategy
steps.description: Detailed comparative market analysis — pricing is both an art and a science.

steps.title: Prepare Your Home
steps.description: Staging consultation, repairs prioritization, and curb appeal.

steps.title: Professional Marketing
steps.description: Photography, video, MLS syndication, and targeted digital campaigns.

steps.title: Launch & Show
steps.description: Strategic launch day, broker open house, and public open houses.

steps.title: Evaluate Offers
steps.description: I'll analyze every offer with you — price, terms, contingencies, buyer strength.

steps.title: Negotiate
steps.description: Protecting your net proceeds through skilled, calm negotiation.

steps.title: Due Diligence
steps.description: Navigating inspections, appraisal, and attorney review with minimal surprises.

steps.title: Close
steps.description: Settlement day — and the next chapter begins.

marketingShowcase.title: Professional Photography
marketingShowcase.description: HDR photography and twilight exterior shots that make your listing stand out.

marketingShowcase.title: Cinematic Video Tours
marketingShowcase.description: Drone and interior video that captures what photos can't.

marketingShowcase.title: MLS & Portal Syndication
marketingShowcase.description: Zillow, Realtor.com, Compass.com, and 100+ partner sites.

marketingShowcase.title: Targeted Social Campaigns
marketingShowcase.description: Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn campaigns targeted to qualified buyers.

marketingShowcase.title: Open Houses & Broker Events
marketingShowcase.description: Public open houses plus exclusive broker events to drive agent awareness.

marketingShowcase.title: Premium Print Materials
marketingShowcase.description: Property brochures and just-listed mailers that buyers keep.

cta.headline: Ready to find out what your home is worth?
